metadata.title: CVE-2020-36424 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.24.0. An attacker canrecover a private key (for RSA or static Diffie-Hellman) via a side-channelattack against generation of base blinding/unblinding values.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
